price: Suka ce: "Yã bãbanmu!* Lalle ne, mun tafi munã tsẽre, kuma muka bar Yusufu a wurin kãyanmu, sai kerkẽci ya cinye shi, kuma kai, bã mai amincẽwa da mu ba ne, kuma kõ dã mun kasance mãsu gaskiya!"_
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّا ذَهَبۡنَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِندَ مَتَٰعِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُؤۡمِنٖ لَّنَا وَلَوۡ كُنَّا صَٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: * Muhãwararsu tãre da ubansu.Yã nũna baƙin ciki, amma kuma ya mayar da al'amari ga Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā innā dhahabnā nastabiqu wataraknā yūsufa ʿinda matāʿinā fa-akalahu al-dhi'bu wamā anta bimu'minin lanā walaw kunnā ṣādiqīna
